TextLibrary.Text: Life signs... Krystalli life signs. When the spirit asked us for a crystal, it wanted us to bring back one of the Krystalli.
Life signs... Krystalli life signs. When the spirit asked us for a crystal, it wanted us to bring back one of the Krystalli.
They're a dying race, hiding on this planet. It's not right to attack them.
They're a dying race, hiding on this planet. It's not right to attack them.
Billions of lives may depend on this. Fire up the weapons.
Billions of lives may depend on this. Fire up the weapons.
